results.title: John MacArthur: A Bible-Centered Ministry
results.summary: This article reflects on the ministry of John MacArthur, emphasizing his commitment to explaining the Bible using the Bible itself. MacArthur's approach, avoiding personal stories and focusing on timeless truth, aligns with the KJV's emphasis on the unchanging Word of God. "He explained the Bible with the Bible, not cluttering up sermons with personal stories...but teaching timeless truth." (cf. 2 Timothy 4:2).

results.title: Daily Kos Good News Roundup: Resistance and Political Analysis
results.summary: A collection of "Good News" articles from Daily Kos, focusing on political resistance against Donald Trump, Democratic actions, and progressive victories. Reports on Democratic Congress members pushing back against Trump's agenda, such as Alex Padilla and Jasmine Crockett, are highlighted. The summaries note instances where Trump's policies are unpopular or backfiring, with emphasis on economic and social justice issues.
